name: Thrice Upon A Time
description:
Thrice Upon A Time is a set of three stories, going deeper and deeper into the past of three generations, and exploring three virtues.

Controls:

* Advance dialogue with Spacebar

* Play minigames with Arrow Keys and Spacebar

Created by Team Neon:

Sakura Magika, CloudiiSkyz, Azura Dark, and Tourmaline.

For Ludum Dare 48:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/thrice-upon-a-time

Writing, code, gameplay by Sakura Magika:

* https://auswahlaxiom.bandcamp.com/

* https://www.youtube.com/c/mathematicus

Code and gameplay by CloudiiSkyz:

* https://itch.io/profile/nicolekg

* https://github.com/nicolekg

* https://ldjam.com/users/nicolekg/

Music by Tourmaline:

* https://pagefortysix.bandcamp.com/

Art by Azura Dark:

* Found only in the darkest of dark.

Final ambience by klankbeeld:

  • forest summer Roond 022 200619_0186
  • https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/sounds/532424/
